channel.title: SMF vs VB
channel.description: What do you think is better and/or would be better for this forum?

item.title: SMF vs VB
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

[quote=“BlazezFire, post:15, topic:256419”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=338685.msg2628774#msg2628774 date=1231986149]

What do you think is better and/or would be better for this forum?

Smf is far better for free software but if you want a profession site you should use VB so thus vB is best if you want to buy a software.

Why not use SMF for a professional site? Just because something costs money doesn’t make it better, just look at windows.

I of course prefer SMF, otherwise we would be runnig vB here.
[/quote]
Windows is a os not a forum software.[/quote]
Fucking Failure.

Read full topic

item.title: SMF vs VB
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“BlazezFire, post:15, topic:256419”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=338685.msg2628774#msg2628774 date=1231986149]

What do you think is better and/or would be better for this forum?

Smf is far better for free software but if you want a profession site you should use VB so thus vB is best if you want to buy a software.

Why not use SMF for a professional site? Just because something costs money doesn’t make it better, just look at windows.

I of course prefer SMF, otherwise we would be runnig vB here.
[/quote]
Windows is a os not a forum software.[/quote]

Ever heard of an analogy?

If windows and linux were both free, I would still use linux, as I am now.

If vB and SMF were both free, I would still use SMF, as I am now.

Read full topic

item.title: SMF vs VB
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

SMF is by far better because it is open source and free software. It is also being led by miscellaneous members from across the world who have vast experiences in different fields and whom come and go whenever they please, causing for a better working atmosphere via friendliness.

Though VB is much more advanced, SMF is starting to climb the ranks. The new beta SMF 2.0 has many, many more features than older versions of SMF. It is also much more secure and built for large communities. Simple Machines has said on their website that they look toward expanding SMF to be more of an enterprise forum that competes with VB and PHPBB.

Read full topic
